content:
On the night of March 6, Russian occupation troops attacked Ukraine with rockets and shock drones like Shahd.

About thisreportedAir Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The enemy launched 5 anti-aircraft controlled C-300 missiles from the temporarily occupied territory of Donetsk region.

In addition, the Russian troops used 42 percussion drones in four directions-Chauda, Balaklava-Crimea, Kursk region, Primorsko-Akhtarsk-the Russian Federation.

As a result of the combat work, 38 "Shahanedov" within the limits of Dnipropetrovsk, Odessa, Kherson, Khmelnytsky, Cherkasy, Kharkiv, Vinnytsia and Sumy regions were shot.

Air Force Air Force, mobile firing groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine and radio electronic struggle.

As reported by the Armyinform, tonight Russian troopsattackedThe city of Sumy Sumy -type drones is a hit.
title: Shakhi rockets and four directions: Air Force told about the night attack of the Russian Federation in Ukraine
description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy launched 5 anti -aircraft guided missiles ...
author: Army Inform
